title: how to uninstall caffe2 which is installed from source?
body_html:
hi! I install caffe2 from source by the tutorial such as:

git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

now I want to uninstall caffe2. how to do it? thanks!
body_text:
hi! I install caffe2 from source by the tutorial such as:
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

now I want to uninstall caffe2. how to do it? thanks!
body:
hi! I install caffe2 from source by the [tutorial](https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile) such as:
```
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install
```
now I want to uninstall caffe2. how to do it? thanks!
